additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Sugar, vegetable fats, cocoa butter, cocoa mass, whole milk powder, skim milk powder, lactose, milk fat, emulsifier (soy lecithin), pistachio paste, barley malt extract, flavourings, natural flavourings, caramel powder (sweet whey, butter, maltodextrin, sugar, skim milk powder, natural vanilla flavouring).

additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: Milk Chocolate contains: cocoa solids 32% min., milk solids 21% min. Dark Chocolate contains: cocoa solids 45% min.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Be Present Tree Nuts, May Be Present Peanuts

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Quality Guarantee Chocoladefabriken Lindt & Sprngli AG Kilchberg / Switzerland
